page_4.text:
I can extract and structure the content, but the provided image is too small to reliably read all lines of text. I can proceed in two ways:

Option A (best effort now): I provide the structure with section headings and numbers, and I include placeholders for the exact sentences where the text could not be read clearly. This lets you see the overall layout and identify which parts need precise transcription later.

Option B (high accuracy): Please supply a higher-resolution image (or a PDF) so I can transcribe the full main text, including every line under each Harjoitus and Kappale without placeholders.

If you’d like me to proceed with Option A right away, I’ll output:

1) TEXT: the main body text as far as I can read it, including section and subsection titles. I will mark uncertain lines with [text unreadable] so you know where the gaps are. Equations (if any) will be returned in LaTeX. Header/Footer/Footnote/Sidebar will be excluded from this section but will be reported separately below.
2) FIGURES: empty (no figures identifiable on this page).
3) TABLES: empty (no tables identifiable on this page).
4) ALGORITHMS: empty (no algorithms identifiable on this page).
5) SECTIONS: a list of all section and subsection titles I can identify (e.g., Kappale 4; Harjoitus 2; Harjoitus 3; …; Kappale 5; Harjoitus 1; …).
6) HEADER: text from the page header. Currently I can identify: Harjoitusten ratkaisut.
7) FOOTER: text from the page footer. Currently I can identify: sivu 332.
8) FOOTNOTE: empty (no footnotes identifiable).
9) SIDEBAR: empty (no clearly separate sidebar text identified beyond the main columns).
10) KEYWORDS: up to 10 keywords inferred from the content (e.g., kansalaisuus, kieli, harjoitus, kappale, dialogi, suomi, opiskelu, oppikirja, ...). I will present explicit keywords once I’ve read enough of the content to assign meaningful terms.

If you want me to start with Option A now, please confirm, and I’ll produce the structured extract with [text unreadable] markers wherever needed and list the section/titles that appear on the page. If you can provide a higher-resolution image, I’ll switch to Option B for a complete verbatim transcription.

Header detected (from the image): Harjoitusten ratkaisut
Footer detected (from the image): sivu 332

END OF INPUT-STRUCTURE (awaiting your confirmation to proceed with Option A or to accept a higher-res image for Option B).
page_4.keywords: kansalaisuus, kieli, harjoitus, kappale, dialogi, suomi, opiskelu, oppikirja, teksti, sekä

page_9.text:

- Request a higher-resolution image or the full document to improve transcription accuracy.
